name: Umbra's Ghost
description:
Description

A  short, atmospheric puzzle game inspired by late-90s first person point-and-clicks like Myst. Created for the Secret Santa Game Jam 2021!

Story

Yer a pirate boarding a long-forgotten ship, the Umbra. Many-a-legend heard ye about this vessel, and many a legend ye ignored. The cap'n went down before the ship, folks say he scared his crew off. But yer too brave for fairy-tales, eh? Best of luck to ye.. Who knows, maybe you'll walk away rich. Or maybe you'll end up just like him.
